description.value: When you use your @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.Item.hx1F2DRLVa1bfCzz]{Fighting Style: Protection}, you can first move up to half your speed to protect someone further than 5 ft. away. You do not take @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.C3b7Ref9xEVn34Gf.JournalEntryPage.5zEWVU1yw2Sv3hSI]{Attacks of Opportunity} during this movement.
